caseTitle: Mst.Nazeeran & others v. Ali Bux (deceased) through his L.Rs.& others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Hasan Azhar Rizvi
tagline: (1) The standard of evidence is not uniform when challenging a registered document as compared to challenging an unregistered document. (2) A mere denial by the executant of a registered sale deed is insufficient to shift the burden onto the beneficiary to prove the valid execution of the registered document.
